alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 9:56PM CDT until July 06 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Pemiscot County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 956 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Senath, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Gosnell, Manila, Senath, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Calumet, Buckeye, Woodland Corner, Pawheen, Noland, Poplar Corner, Stark City, Yarbro, Rives, Hornersville Junction, West Hermondale, Octa, Scobeville and Vincit. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
